ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol
Class CollaborationSerializer

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.CollaborationSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProtocolConstants, Serializer
public class CollaborationSerializer
extends Object
implements Serializer, ProtocolConstants

Serializes XML messages used in a collaborative session. Implementation of interface Serializer.
